passives.name: Herald of the Tome: Splintered Secrets
Dual Wield: Twin Blade and Blunt (Mace)
Herald of the Tome: Fated Fortune
Dual Wield: Twin Blade and Blunt (Axe)

TOOLTIP_DICT.Major Breach: Reduces target's Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Minor Breach: Reduces target's Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Elemental Catalyst: Enemies take up to 15% increased Critical Damage when affected by different elemental status effects.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Legendary Infused Crusher Enchant: Targets the closest enemy you damage, applying Crusher to reduce their Armor. Only one enemy can be affected at a time. Value scales with enchant quality and with the Infused trait on the weapon.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Runic Sunder:
Soldier of Apocrypha
Target: Enemy • Range: 22m • Cost: 1377
Skill description
Craft a defensive Apocryphal rune that deals 1161 Physical Damage. The rune steals 2200 Armor and applies Minor Maim for 15 seconds, reducing their damage done by 5%. The rune also taunts for 15 seconds if it would not cause taunt immunity, and generates Crux. While slotted, damage taken is reduced by 2% per active Crux.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Crystal Weapon:
Target: Self • Dark Magic • Cost: 2295
Skill description
Encase your weapon in dark crystals for 6 seconds, causing your next two Light or Heavy Attacks to deal additional damage and reduce the target's Armor by 1000 for 5 seconds.
The first hit deals 2091 Physical Damage and the second deals 836 Physical Damage.
After casting, your next non-Ultimate ability used within 3 seconds costs 10% less.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Velothi Ur-Mage's Amulet: Mythic: Increases Penetration and Critical Damage, with reduced Healing Taken.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Shattered Fate: Set effect grants significant Penetration based on stacks.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Roar of Alkosh: Trial set: On synergy use, reduces enemies' Armor in an area.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Crimson Oath's Rive: Dungeon set: Applying a Major or Minor Breach also reduces Armor to nearby enemies.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Tremorscale: Monster set: Taunting an enemy triggers Physical Damage and reduces their Armor.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Wood Elf Passive: Hunter's Eye:
Wood Elf (Bosmer)
Effect
Rank 1: Increases your Stealth Detection radius by 1 meter. Increases your Movement Speed by 1% and your Physical and Spell Penetration by 300.
Rank 2: Increases your Stealth Detection radius by 2 meters. Increases your Movement Speed by 3% and your Physical and Spell Penetration by 600.
Rank 3: Increases your Stealth Detection radius by 3 meters. Increases your Movement Speed by 5% and your Physical and Spell Penetration by 950.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Grave Lord Passive: Dismember:
Necromancer — Grave Lord
Effect
Rank 1: While a Grave Lord ability is active, your Spell and Physical Penetration are increased by 1635.
Rank 2: While a Grave Lord ability is active, your Spell and Physical Penetration are increased by 3271.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Herald of the Tome: Splintered Secrets:
Arcanist — Herald of the Tome
Effect
Rank 1: Increase your Physical and Spell Penetration by 620 per Herald of the Tome ability slotted.
Rank 2: Increase your Physical and Spell Penetration by 1240 per Herald of the Tome ability slotted.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Light Armor Passive: Concentration:
Light Armor
Skill description
Increases your Physical and Spell Penetration by 939 for each piece of Light Armor worn.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Dual Wield: Twin Blade and Blunt (Mace):
Dual Wield
Skill description
Grants a bonus based on the type of weapon equipped: Each axe increases your Critical Damage done by 6%. Each mace increases your Offensive Penetration by 1487. Each sword increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 129. Each dagger increases your Critical Chance rating by 657.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Two Handed: Heavy Weapons (Maul):
Two Handed
Skill description
Grants a bonus based on the type of weapon equipped: Greatswords increase your Weapon and Spell Damage by 258. Battle Axes increase your Critical Damage done by 12%. Mauls increase your Offensive Penetration by 2974.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Assassination: Hemorrhage:
Nightblade — Assassination
Effect
With an Assassination ability slotted
Rank 1: Increases your Critical Damage by 5%. Dealing Critical Damage grants you and your group Minor Savagery, increasing Weapon Critical rating by 1314 for 10 seconds.
Rank 2: Increases your Critical Damage by 10%. Dealing Critical Damage grants you and your group Minor Savagery, increasing Weapon Critical rating by 1314 for 20 seconds.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Herald of the Tome: Fated Fortune:
Arcanist — Herald of the Tome
Effect
Rank 1: When you generate or consume Crux, increase your Critical Damage and Critical Healing by 6% for 7 seconds.
Rank 2: When you generate or consume Crux, increase your Critical Damage and Critical Healing by 12% for 7 seconds.
Tooltips by ESO-Hub.com
TOOLTIP_DICT.Aedric Spear: Piercing Spear:
Templar — Aedric Spear
Effect
With an Aedric Spear ability slotted
Rank 1: Increases your Critical Damage by 6%. Increases your damage done to blocking players by 6%.
Rank 2: Increases your Critical Damage by 12%. Increases your damage done to blocking players by 12%.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Medium Armor: Dexterity:
Medium Armor
Effect
Rank 1: Increases your Critical Damage and Healing done by 1% for every 2 pieces of Medium Armor equipped.
Rank 2: Increases your Critical Damage and Healing done by 1% for every piece of Medium Armor equipped.
Rank 3: Increases your Critical Damage and Healing done by 2% for every piece of Medium Armor equipped.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Animal Companions: Advanced Species:
Warden — Animal Companions
Effect
Rank 1: Increases your Critical Damage by 2% for each Animal Companion ability slotted.
Rank 2: Increases your Critical Damage by 5% for each Animal Companion ability slotted.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Dual Wield: Twin Blade and Blunt (Axe):
Dual Wield
Effect
While Dual Wielding
Rank 1: Each axe increases your Critical Damage done by 3%. Each mace increases your Offensive Penetration by 743. Each sword increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 64. Each dagger increases your Critical Chance rating by 328.
Rank 2: Each axe increases your Critical Damage done by 6%. Each mace increases your Offensive Penetration by 1487. Each sword increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 129. Each dagger increases your Critical Chance rating by 657.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Two Handed: Heavy Weapons (Axe):
Two Handed
Effect
With a Two-Handed weapon equipped
Rank 1: Greatswords +129 Weapon & Spell Damage. Battle Axes +6% Critical Damage done. Mauls +1487 Offensive Penetration.
Rank 2: Greatswords +258 Weapon & Spell Damage. Battle Axes +12% Critical Damage done. Mauls +2974 Offensive Penetration.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Khajiit Passive: Feline Ambush:
Khajiit
Effect
Rank 1: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing by 4%. Decreases your detection radius in Stealth by 1 meter.
Rank 2: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing by 8%. Decreases your detection radius in Stealth by 2 meters.
Rank 3: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing by 12%. Decreases your detection radius in Stealth by 3 meters.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Mora Scribe's Thesis: Set: Builds stacks to increase Critical Damage up to a maximum.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Harpooner's Wading Kilt: Mythic: Stacking Critical Chance/Critical Damage while staying in combat and avoiding direct damage.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Lucent Echoes: Set: Grants a burst of Critical Damage after proccing its condition; strong for sustained crit-focused builds.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Sul-Xan's Torment: Set: Provides Critical Damage when enemies are recently slain or affected; excels in add-heavy encounters.
TOOLTIP_DICT.Armor Set Penetration Bonus:
Extra Penetration granted by certain armor sets when wearing multiple pieces.
Examples:
  • Tide-born Wildstalker
  • Ansuul's Torment

cpTooltips.Champion Point: Piercing:
Champion Point: Piercing
Increases Physical and Spell Penetration by 350 per stage.
Max 2 stages (700 total).
cpTooltips.Champion Point: Force of Nature:
Champion Point: Force of Nature
Increases Penetration based on unique status effects applied to the enemy.
Synergizes well with elemental status effects.
cpTooltips.Fighting Finesse:
Fighting Finesse
Raises Critical Damage and Healing by 4% per stage.
Max 2 stages (8% total).
cpTooltips.Backstabber:
Backstabber
Increases Critical Damage by 2% per stage when attacking from behind enemies.
Max 5 stages (10%).
